kpi.name: M1002C52

kpi_info.title: RT DCH REQ FOR CS DATA CALL CONV CLASS REJECT IN UL IN SRNC
kpi_info.use: A total number of rejected RT DCH requests for a transparent CS Data Call with conversational class in the SRNC for reasons caused by UL radio resources.

kpi.kpi_alias: RT DCH REQ FOR CS DATA CALL CONV CLASS REJECT IN UL IN SRNC
